mapper.select: select * from movie where title = #{id} or director = #{id} or INSTR(',' || REGEXP_REPLACE(actors, '\\s*,\\s*', ',') || ',', ',' || #{id} || ',') > 0
select * from movie left join review using (movie_id) where movie_id=#{id}
select * from review inner join movie using (movie_id) where user_id=#{id} order by user_id desc offset #{start} rows fetch next 5 rows only
select count(*) from review inner join movie using (movie_id) where user_id=#{id}

select r.*, TO_CHAR(sch.start_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS start_dt, TO_CHAR(sch.end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS end_dt, m.*, ss.*, s.*, sc.*, rs.*, sc2.* from reservation r inner join reservation_seat rs on r.reservation_id = rs.reservation_id inner join seat_status ss on rs.seat_status_id = ss.seat_status_id inner join seat s on ss.seat_id = s.seat_id inner join schedule sch on r.schedule_id = sch.schedule_id inner join movie m on sch.movie_id = m.movie_id inner join screen sc on sch.screen_id = sc.screen_id inner join screen sc2 on s.screen_id = sc2.screen_id where r.user_id=#{id} order by sch.start_dt desc offset #{start} rows fetch next 5 rows only

select count(*) from reservation r inner join reservation_seat rs on r.reservation_id = rs.reservation_id inner join seat_status ss on rs.seat_status_id = ss.seat_status_id inner join seat s on ss.seat_id = s.seat_id inner join schedule sch on r.schedule_id = sch.schedule_id inner join movie m on sch.movie_id = m.movie_id inner join screen sc on sch.screen_id = sc.screen_id inner join screen sc2 on s.screen_id = sc2.screen_id where r.user_id=#{id}
select count(*) from review inner join movie using (movie_id) where user_id=#{id} and movie_id=#{movie_id}
